intex_spa__error.E91: [E91] Low salt level or no salt

intex_spa__error_description.E81: [E81] Make sure the spa is powered on and the wireless control panel is within range of the control base (5m / 16ft)
intex_spa__error_description.E90: [E90] Check the filter cartridge and ensure nothing is clogging the circulation system
intex_spa__error_description.E91: [E91] Add more salt and make sure the electrolytic cell cord is firmly plugged in
intex_spa__error_description.E92: [E92] Partially drain the spa and refill with fresh water
intex_spa__error_description.E94: [E94] Add warm water to raise the spa temperature above 5°C / 41°F
intex_spa__error_description.E95: [E95] Turn off the heater, check the filter cartridge and ensure nothing is clogging the circulation system
intex_spa__error_description.E96: [E96] Turn off and unplug the spa. Check the ﬁlter cartridge and ensure nothing is clogging the circulation system, then restart the spa
intex_spa__error_description.E97: [E97] Turn off and unplug the spa immediately. Contact Intex Service Center
intex_spa__error_description.E99: [E99] Turn off and unplug the spa immediately. Contact Intex Service Center
